name: Into the pit (pangake)
description:
Into the pit is a dungeon crawler with permadeath and no healing, rendered in a mix of 2d and pseudo 3d where our protagonist tries to navigate a maze inside the pit where he was thrown in.

Controls  [keyboard | controller]
move - arrow keys | left stick
action/attack - space | A

This game is in a very early stage of development, so don't expect much content at this time. My idea was to publish what I had to get the ball rolling.
If you wanna know what I'm working on or encourage me, feel free to follow me on twitter @pangakedev
